x_nuvo_diag_probes.description:
Workspace Manager-Over occupancy conflict window functionality is not working
Steps to reproduce: Go to Space management-> 1)Organization & spaces->Floor 2)Go to any valid floor and Right-click on it 3)Click on launch Workspace Manager app 4)Assign some users in the location which Is occupied 5)Result user should get a conflict window
Expected: Over occupancy, conflict window should work as expected and User should be assigned to already occupied space.
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: Over-Occupancy Functionality Not Working
x_nuvo_diag_probes.remediation: This issue is seen in Oman versions, Update Set is available which solves this issue, Please apply the Update Set which resolves the issue, Update Set name - SPACE-OMAN-SFM-9500

sys_update_version.name: x_nuvo_diag_probes_dfe4e6241bc5d910ae5b21b5ec4bcb8b
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_nuvo_diag_probes"><x_nuvo_diag_probes action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Workspace Manager-Over occupancy conflict window functionality is not working

Steps to reproduce:
Go to Space management->
1)Organization & spaces->Floor
2)Go to any valid floor and Right-click on it 
3)Click on launch Workspace Manager app
4)Assign some users in the location which Is occupied
5)Result user should get a conflict window

Expected: Over occupancy, conflict window should work as expected and User should be assigned to already occupied space.</description><healthcheck_type/><name>Over-Occupancy Functionality Not Working</name><order>100</order><probe_type/><product_version/><remediation>This issue is seen in Oman versions, Update Set is available which solves this issue, Please apply the Update Set which resolves the issue, 
Update Set name - SPACE-OMAN-SFM-9500</remediation><script><![CDATA[var util = new x_nuvo_diag.DiagnosticUtil();
//Checking if connected workplace version is Oman
var nuvoloVersionQuery = "name=Connected Workplace^active=true^versionSTARTSWITH16.";
var nuvoloVersion = new GlideRecord("sys_scope");
nuvoloVersion.addEncodedQuery(nuvoloVersionQuery);
nuvoloVersion.query();
if (nuvoloVersion.next()) {
	var updSet = new GlideRecord('sys_update_set');
	updSet.addEncodedQuery('name=SPACE-OMAN-SFM-9500');
	updSet.query();
	
	if(!updSet.next()){
		
    util.handleOutput('There is already a Bug for Over-Occupancy Functionality Not Working issue in OMAN release, Please apply Update Set SPACE-OMAN-SFM-9500 which solves the issue for Oman Version.  ', 'warning', 'Space');
}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Prasanna.Phadtare@nuvolo.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-29 10:23:25</sys_created_on><sys_id>dfe4e6241bc5d910ae5b21b5ec4bcb8b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Over-Occupancy Functionality Not Working</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Diagnostic Tool" source="x_nuvo_diag">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Diagnostic Tool">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes_dfe4e6241bc5d910ae5b21b5ec4bcb8b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Stefan.Popov@nuvolo.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-17 11:21:25</sys_updated_on><tool>diagnostic</tool></x_nuvo_diag_probes></record_update>
